title: Play Protect
extract: Help protect against harmful apps with Google Play Protect. Google Play Protect helps you keep your device safe and secure. It runs a safety check on apps from the Google Play Store before you download them. It checks your device for potentially harmful apps from other sources.
extract_html: Help protect against harmful apps with Google Play Protect. Google Play Protect helps you keep your device safe and secure. It runs a safety check on apps from the Google Play Store before you download them. It checks your device for potentially harmful apps from other sources.
